abstract: The “Saturday Night Live” sketches that endorsed Pepsi using the MacGruber character were the first in a collaboration between PepsiCo and the NBC series.
snippet: The “Saturday Night Live” sketches that endorsed Pepsi using the MacGruber character were the first in a collaboration between PepsiCo and the NBC series.
lead_paragraph: The “Saturday Night Live” sketches that endorsed Pepsi using the MacGruber character were “the first in a collaboration between PepsiCo and Lorne Michaels,” the executive producer of the NBC series, Stuart Elliott reports.
